summary:
If anyone has a question, especially a hospice career question I'd be thrilled to help. Having worked in hospice for 20+ years. I helped so many hospices start from the expansion to Vitas Healthcare to getting into hospice such from Amedisys to Seasons when they launched.  Salary comparrison/negotiation advancement of career to how to increase census are high areas of expertise. 

Hospice & Home Care -
Our focus on hospice and home health has fostered mastery of building the best team to support and grow your business. We provide a completely unique offering, balancing our 20+years of intensive hospice work nationwide ( consulting, recruitment, clinical & operational & development). We have expertise in building hospices in all market settings, HR IT solutions, outsourced HR and construction of career center websites with interactive job board technology.  

We analyze the healthcare HR department’s ability to manage HR functions and reduce the staffing budget by 30% to 60%. We are accomplished at supporting all arenas of health care. 
Acquisitions of hospice companies

Job SItes :  
www.HospiceRecruiters.com  Hospice Staffing & Consulting Specialists Innovators in hospice staffingwww.HomeCareCareers.com  NOW online which has represented over 150,000 jobs listed and over 180,000 job seeker registrants. The leading Home care and hospice providers are represented.
www.HospiceChoices.com  The Hospice Career Center. 55,000 job seekers registered and 1,900 hospices registered.

SEO, Technology based (innovative) staffing solutions, job board construction,  Human Resources consulting, organizational development, healthcare sales and marketing,



Athletics Recruitment
www.AttractAthletics.com Athletic Recruitment Management System (ARMS) web based recruitment software to manage the recruitment process for female athletes to assist in gaining college scholarships.

We source outstanding candidates for our clients. We are experts in Healthcare recruitment advertising and sourcing.
